Hero.description: Welcome to Dawar Al Saada, where we meet for a unique experience in the world of Saudi cuisine

About.description_p1: Our journey began in Riyadh... with a simple idea but big ambitions. A light Saudi breakfast with a flavor to suit every taste and an unprecedented service experience in terms of speed and quality.
About.description_p2: With the dedication of a team of young people from the nation, we began to expand and reached more than 160 branches throughout the Kingdom, with a presence in ten Gulf, Arab and international countries.

Franchise.title: Partner in Success
Franchise.subtitle: Invest in a leading Saudi brand and achieve rewarding returns. Join the success story of Dawar Al Saada.
Franchise.roi_desc: We offer a proven business model that ensures high investment returns and a record capital recovery period.
Franchise.support_desc: We provide full support in site selection, design, recruitment, training, and marketing to ensure a strong start.
Franchise.customers_desc: Benefit from the strong reputation and great popularity our brand enjoys in the Saudi market.
Franchise.success_msg: Thank you for your interest in investing with us. The franchise team will review your request and contact you soon.
Franchise.error_msg: An error occurred while sending the request
Franchise.location_link: Do you have a location? (Google Maps Link)

Careers.description: We are always looking for passionate talents to join the Dawar Al Saada family. If you have passion and ambition, your place is with us.
Careers.success_msg: Thank you for your interest in joining us. We will review your request and contact you soon.
Careers.cv_placeholder: Click to upload or drag file here
Careers.file_size_error: File size must be less than 5MB
Careers.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong, please try again

AppPromo.default_description: Download Dawar Al Saada app and enjoy delicious Saudi cuisine delivered to wherever you are. Exclusive offers, fast delivery, and a unique user experience.

Footer.slogan: What your heart desires... Start your day right, make it bright.
